description: For Windows users, session files are located in the following directory: C:\​[username]\​AppData\​Roaming\​Sublime Text [version]\​Settings
For OS X users, session files are located in the following directory: ~/​Library/​Application Support/​Sublime Text [version]/​Settings

common_filenames.description: Auto Save Session.sublime_session - The file stores the data from your auto saved session. It is deleted when the application is quit.
